name: taglicious
description: Taglicious is a versatile and extensible React component for managing tags and multi-select inputs with customizable rendering and seamless integration with various UI libraries.
author: Miguel Guedes <miguel@softgeist.com>

scripts.setup: npm install && cd storybook && npm install
scripts.clean:full: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules storybook/node_modules packages/*/node_modules
scripts.check: set -e; for i in code lint fmt; do npm run check:$i; done; echo 'check: PASS'
scripts.check:code: npm run check:tsc && npm run check:lint
